channel.title: ::players Help
channel.description:
Hey guys in my commands.java i am trying to edit it to where when i do ::players if a staff is online it will have the crown next to their name but idk how to do it. I put for example "<img=2>" Then compiled and it said the image isnt found so any help please would be appreciated.
Source:overloadx

item.title: ::players Help
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

[quote=“Snackman, post:2, topic:378977”]try

  • <img=0> (mod crown)
  • <img=1> (admin crown)

<img=2> in yell, for example, is a chat balloon, and I doubt you want that

well, try this out, and i hope it worked[/quote]
ok so here is like my admin yell } else if (p.playerRights == 3) {
title ="Admin, “;
so would it be something like this?
} else if (p.playerRights == 3) {
title =”<img=0> Admin, ";
Because idk if its going to work please reply.

Read full topic

item.title: ::players Help
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

try

  • <img=0> (mod crown)
  • <img=1> (admin crown)

<img=2> in yell, for example, is a chat balloon, and I doubt you want that

well, try this out, and i hope it worked
